hero_title: An exciting learning journey with an AI friend!
hero_subtitle: Unleash our child's curiosity with infinite creativity! Friender helps children grow joyfully with verified educational content and safe AI technology.
what_can_you_do_title: What can you do with Friender?
dreamPath_title: Dream Path - The exciting path to find your dreams
dreamPath_desc: Follow the learning course recommended by AI according to your interests and take a step closer to your dreams.
innoWorks_title: Inno Works - My own idea workshop
innoWorks_desc: Make everything you imagine a reality, including coding, drawing, and making music!
story_desc: A fairy tale where I am the protagonist! Create your own unique story with AI.
trust_section_title: Our child's first AI friend you can trust
global_access: With friends from all over the world
contact_cta_desc: Have more questions? Feel free to contact us anytime.
